trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Northglenn
There were no other sightings in Northglenn on or around December 22nd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving at the time, I forget which road it was but it was in Westminster heading North. I noticed the objects because they were brighter than airplanes and seemed to be hovering over the ?Lafyette? Area. I thought it was just an airplane with the airport near by but these objects were brighter than the stars and airplanes I'm used to seeing. The objects didn't do anything they just seemed to hover there, the less brighter one higher the brightest. I don't really have any feelings about what I saw because I'm not sure what it was...plane? Flares? Helicopter? I'm just not sure, if anything I'm just confused. I lost sight od them after turning onto 120th east bound to go home.
